availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Williamsburg, Whitley County, KY. A Knox County, Kentucky-born farmer.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Williamsburg, p. 56.

Find A Grave, Entry for Joseph Dowis Ferris (1808-1866), Find A Grave Memorial # 30946449, Farris Cemetery, Walden, Whitley County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=farris&GSfn=joseph&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScnty=1106&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=30946449&df=all& (accessed 22 June 2017).
